caption:
The photograph captures a river scene framed through what appears to be an overhanging Spanish moss. In the middle distance, a large multi-story riverboat or tugboat, marked with "FNC" on its structure, can be seen pushing a series barge units with markings 'BUN EB-7' along the reflective surface of the river. The watercraft and barges are painted in blue and white, which stand out against the natural backdrop.

The background shows a lush tree line across the river, suggesting a vibrant, natural setting. The sky is partly cloudy, providing a dynamic and textured appearance above the serene river. The overall atmosphere is tranquil, with a focus on the daily activities of river transportation and the interaction of human-made structures within a natural environment. This composition offers a glimpse into riverine logistics and the scenic landscapes along the waterway.
title: Derelict boat
